name: Astral Ball
description:
Please Note! There seems to be a bug with the web version that makes it seem washed out, for better graphics I'd use the downloaded versions.

A fun relaxing game were you roll a ball through some obstacles. In Space!

Controls:

If the ball glitches then try restarting the level with R.

Press Space Bar to change zoom.

WASD or arrow keys to rotate box.

E or shift to move camera up.

Q or control to move camera down.

Move the mouse from left to right to pan.

3D models and code created by Ivan Martin.

Music created by Joaquin Vintimilla.
